title: Net profits/loss of Italian company Dolce & Gabbana in 2014 to 2018
summary: In general Net profits/loss in million euros has rose over the Year.
Net profits/loss in million euros is slightly increasing from 2016 to 2017.
The line rapidly increased by 638.61% from Year 2016 to 2017.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2016 and 2017.
Maximum Net profits/loss in million euros, about 27.55 was reported at Year 2017
The lowest Net profits/loss in million euros, of value 3.73 was reported at Year 2016
